message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. I believe it's a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I'm really interested in the product, but I think $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, $9,500 is significantly below my bottom line.  To be fair to both of us, I can come down to $13,000. This reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, at $11,500. I believe this price reflects a fair value for the product and my business needs.
